data.lyric:
[ti:Good Vibes]
[ar:Chris Janson]
[al:Good Vibes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Good Vibes - Chris Janson
[00:05.45]Lyrics by：Ashley Gorley/Chris Janson/Zach Crowell
[00:10.90]I ain't watching TV today
[00:13.22]Bad news it can just stay away
[00:15.48]If you ain't got anything good to say
[00:18.20]Then shut your mouth
[00:20.29]I got my windows down and my blinders on
[00:23.52]Radio set to my favorite song
[00:26.26]All green lights on the road I'm on
[00:28.49]Man there ain't no doubt
[00:30.64]I'm getting them good vibes
[00:33.15]I'm living this good life
[00:35.81]I'm breathing on Gods time
[00:38.84]And I ain't gonna waste one breath
[00:41.00]I'm soaking it all up
[00:43.54]I got me a full cup
[00:46.22]And there ain't nothing gonna spill it
[00:48.35]Nothing gonna kill it
[00:49.63]Waving them worries goodbye
[00:51.43]I'm feeling them good vibes
[00:57.77]I ain't tryna hear the negative
[01:00.08]I'm just tryna change the narrative
[01:03.00]It's simply imperative
[01:05.11]That we all have a d**n good time
[01:07.05]I'm getting them good vibes
[01:09.58]I'm living this good life
[01:12.11]I'm breathing on Gods time
[01:15.49]And I ain't gonna waste one breath
[01:17.48]I'm soaking it all up
[01:20.01]I got me a full cup
[01:22.62]And there ain't nothing gonna spill it
[01:24.80]Nothing gonna kill it
[01:26.27]Waving them worries goodbye
[01:27.97]I'm feeling them good vibes
[01:32.70]Oh I'm feeling them good vibes
[01:39.52]I got a good girl
[01:40.80]She got a good smile
[01:42.11]I kiss her good morning
[01:43.46]I kiss her good night
[01:44.69]We keep it on the up
[01:46.02]That's how we get down
[01:47.46]So don't be coming around
[01:48.93]She got them good vibes
[01:51.29]I'm living this good life
[01:54.03]I'm breathing on Gods time
[01:57.27]And I ain't gonna waste one breath
[01:59.50]I'm soaking it all up
[02:01.79]I got me a full cup
[02:04.30]And there ain't nothing gonna spill it
[02:06.78]Nothing gonna kill it
[02:07.86]Waving them worries goodbye
[02:09.78]I'm feeling them good vibes
[02:15.11]I'm breathing on Gods time
[02:18.17]And I ain't gonna waste one breath
[02:19.99]I'm soaking it all up
[02:22.59]I got me a full cup
[02:25.17]And there ain't nothing gonna spill it
[02:27.42]Nothing gonna kill it
[02:28.83]Waving them worries goodbye
[02:30.72]I'm feeling them good vibes
[02:35.00]Oh I'm feeling them good vibes
[02:40.35]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Good Vibes]
[ar:Chris Janson]
[al:Good Vibes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.45]//
[00:10.90]今天我没有看电视
[00:13.22]坏消息都离我远一点
[00:15.48]如果你没有什么好话要说
[00:18.20]那就闭上你的嘴
[00:20.29]我关上窗户 戴上眼罩
[00:23.52]收音机里放着我最喜欢的歌
[00:26.26]全程一路绿灯 我出发了
[00:28.49]兄弟 毫无疑问
[00:30.64]我今天兴致不错
[00:33.15]我过着美好的生活
[00:35.81]连空气都是幸福的味道
[00:38.84]让我一口也舍不得浪费
[00:41.00]我尽情地呼吸
[00:43.54]给自己倒上满满一杯酒
[00:46.22]但我绝不会让酒洒了
[00:48.35]休想破坏我的兴致
[00:49.63]挥手告别烦恼
[00:51.43]我感觉今天很开心
[00:57.77]不想听到任何负面消息
[01:00.08]我只是想改变现状
[01:03.00]我们都有必要
[01:05.11]让自己的生活更美好
[01:07.05]我今天兴致不错
[01:09.58]我过着美好的生活
[01:12.11]连空气都是幸福的味道
[01:15.49]让我一口也舍不得浪费
[01:17.48]我尽情地呼吸
[01:20.01]给自己倒上满满一杯酒
[01:22.62]但我绝不会让酒洒了
[01:24.80]休想破坏我的兴致
[01:26.27]挥手告别烦恼
[01:27.97]我感觉今天很开心
[01:32.70]我感觉今天很开心
[01:39.52]我交了一个美丽的女朋友
[01:40.80]她笑容灿烂
[01:42.11]我亲吻她 跟她说早安
[01:43.46]我亲吻她 跟她道晚安
[01:44.69]我们保持着神秘感
[01:46.02]这样爱情才能经久不衰
[01:47.46]所以 别靠近我
[01:48.93]她正在兴头上
[01:51.29]我过着美好的生活
[01:54.03]连空气都是幸福的味道
[01:57.27]让我一口也舍不得浪费
[01:59.50]我尽情地呼吸
[02:01.79]给自己倒上满满一杯酒
[02:04.30]但我绝不会让酒洒了
[02:06.78]休想破坏我的兴致
[02:07.86]挥手告别烦恼
[02:09.78]我感觉今天很开心
[02:15.11]连空气都是幸福的味道
[02:18.17]让我一口也舍不得浪费
[02:19.99]我尽情地呼吸
[02:22.59]给自己倒上满满一杯酒
[02:25.17]但我绝不会让酒洒了
[02:27.42]休想破坏我的兴致
[02:28.83]挥手告别烦恼
